attributes.action: Apologise for the British Raj and to compensate India.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to raise the question of when will the British Goverment apologise for British Raj and the partition of the country which not only left millions of people dead but literilly Raped one of the most richest countries of the world of its wealth. I also believe that it is right for the Crown jewels which is made up of the Kohinoor Diamond which belongs to India
